thread.title: 13 hospitalized after Dillinger Escape Plan bus crashes | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: 13 hospitalized after Dillinger Escape Plan bus crashes | Daily Mail Online

author: James Wilkinson For Dailymail.Com
title: 13 hospitalized after Dillinger Escape Plan bus crashes | Daily Mail Online
text: US band The Dillinger Escape Plan are among THIRTEEN people hospitalized after their tour bus is hit by a semi-truck in Poland The accident occurred on Saturday night, as the band were traveling to Krakow A semi smashed into the rear of the bus, which was partly on the emergency lane The band and a pregnant woman on board were not seriously injured, cops said But the semi's driver had spinal injuries and the band's driver had broken bones Police are testing the blood of both drivers to see if alcohol was a factor Sunday's Krawkow gig has been canceled. They next play Germany on Tuesday Published: 13:09 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 22:48 GMT, 12 February 2017 123 shares
